content: if you are looking to crochet a little original and sweet decoration for your christmas tree the christmas gift macaron will be perfect you can also use it as a decoration for christmas or to give it away **very easy and quick to make** this gift macaron will have a small effect in your christmas tree **beginner friendly** *material used* - crochet 2 mm or crochet hook suitable for your yarn - cotton yarn fingering colors of your choice - golden yarn if you want to hang your macaron - wool needle - stitch markers - a pair of scissors - glue or textile adhesive - stuffing *abbreviations used* r row single_crochet single_crochet increase increase decrease decrease chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet … repeat around the row … in the same stitch **all rights reserved you can not resell share modify or publish this pattern copyright 2024 myrainbowcrochet**
